Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Polk
ShortDescription: #54 Cicero buses temp. rerouted NB via Cicero, Roosevelt, Laramie, Lexington, and Cicero; SB via Cicero, Flournoy, Laramie, Roosevelt, and Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/Polk due to an accident. 

Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, Roosevelt, Laramie, Lexington, then resume their normal route on Cicero.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Flournoy, Laramie, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Cicero..

Allow extra travel time.
